main event: On 9 August 1964, a civilian resident of Pittsfield, Massachusetts reported observing an unidentified flying object.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright white light stationary about 20 degrees above the horizon., The observation lasted approximately 20 minutes., Witnesses included a couple who saw a round object approximately 30 feet in diameter., The object had a glowing quality and appeared to flash or blink at irregular intervals., A Technical Sergeant from Otis Air Force Base investigated but concluded it was most likely a star or planet.
sighted object: unidentified flying object glowing in the sky
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. X from Pittsfield, reliable observers
